data.text: Keini'n karingnga tuikham kintung pha, khawa tuiram kha Malta eii ti keini'n kinjetjei.
Halli khawa ramma mi ngaikhan keinidiang innaminriang hi lekteii emak, ajarchu ruo kasur khat-um adai jarra, inmani'n mei innathopiya, keini rakip kha innaleidon jei.
Paul in thing ajuokhoomma meiya atuoli, mei ahonglum pha maruul inkhat ahongsuok ah paul kutkhan kaherjei.

Khawa ramma mi ngaikhan Paul kut-ah atur kangar maruul khan ikaikha inmupha, inmani inkhatli inkhat in-inti, hiwa mi hi mikathat alei-echeise, ama'n tuipuiya inphut aring innum, arasi inchu ama karingsik zootmak.
Takkha ama'n maruul kha meisuungnga kathingthaak-ah, iteii tikhai makjei.

Ama hong-inthingta emakli jetlei-theileiya purta athisik eii tia inmani'n inleingaidon; takkha inmani'n kasoot-ah in-enna, halli amadiang iteii-um timak inmupha, inmani malung ngaidonkha inthuulla inti, “Ama Pathian inkhat eii!” intijei.
Khawa mun koolla ram lekkhat kanei khawa tuiram karoonpa Publius inti inkhat aleiom; ama'n keini anaruoiya, nithum malung kalok-ah anadonjei.
Publius pa kha ritun khat-um eeksen khan ana-ah aleizaal. Paul in amadiang aluut-ah, Pathian anili, achungnga akut aduongpiya ama kha amindampi jei.
Hiwa athopipha, khawa tuiramma kaom akana leiilak rakip ngai-um inhongnga akana amindampi jei.
Inmani'n karokle inruoiya keinidiang kutchoi phur katamma innapeya, rakuong suungnga kinsilaiseng keini sik-ah arei kaomseng inmani'n innathunpi, halli keini'n rakuong kinhongchuong jei.

Thathum suo, tuiram khanna phalbitha lei-inseng, “Inphir Pathian ramil,”28:11. Twin Gods inti hi Inphir Pathian unai inni raming eii. inmani raminghi Castor khat-um Pollux inti inti Alexandria rakuong inkhat khan keini'n kinchuongjei.
Keini'n Syracuse khuopui kinhongtungnga, khawakhan keini'n nithum kinomjei.
Khawa khanna inphut kinkuoiya Rhegius khuopui kintungjei; ziingkhuo awarli sim tiangnga thi ahongraang, nini huuini khan keini'n Puteoli khuopui khan kinheiwajei.
Khawa munkhan Pathian kangamna ule-nai kin-inmupuiya, keini kha inmani'n nisari omsuomrui inheiti; halli keini Rome tiangkhan kinheiwajei.

Rome khanna kaom ule-nai ngaikhan keini chong injetpha, Appius Phaipui khat-um Inntun Inthum inti mun katung keini kanadonsik inleihong, Paul in inmani amupha, ama'n Pathian inminpaak halli aroktheijei.
Keini'n Rome kinluut pha, Paul raalpa kathosik raalmi ngai khale inruoiya atheinuo-ah omnasik inzootpi jei.

Khawasuo nithum omli ama'n Jihudi lamkakei ngai aleikoichun; inmani'n inlei-inchunpha, ama'n inmani diang ati, “E ule-nai ngai, kei'n kaphung emakli nipi-nipu ngai sina-danle inhal kaleithomak innum, kei Jerusalem mikhumna-ah innada halli Rome mi ngai kutchungnga innapejei.
Rome mi ngai'n kei chong innarakella, keidiang nathatnasik chong iteii ommak jarra inmani'n kei innaleimasuo zoot.
Jihudi ngai'n khawakha leizootmu jarra, kei'n kaphung kami ngaidiang kamasialna iteii ommak innum, kei hi Caesar Rengpa diang karil simak chamakjei. Chuon 25:11
Khawa jarra hiwasik bit-ah kei'n nangni inmupuinasik khat-um inbiakpuina sik kinakoi eii, ajarchu Israel ngai'n inngaidonchak ama jarra kei hi thirruiya innakhit eii.”
Inmani'n amadiang inti, “Keini'n Judea ah inphut nang jarra chemajia inkhat um mumung, halli ule-nai inkhat innum hiwahin hong-inlang, najarra chong kathamak inhongril um ommak.”
Takkha nang-ingaidon kha angme iti keini'n kinrangaizoot, ajarchu hiwa rupngai chungnga amun rakip ah inril keini'n kinjet.

Halli inmani'n amadiang nikhuo khat inmadan puiya, inmani katamtak ama omna suungkhan inhongjei. Inmani diang ama'n Moses Sinadan khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai larik-ah inphut Pathian Rengram jarra sakhi apeya, Jisu kha inmani'n inngamnasik ziingtiangnga inphut zaan katung aleiminchu.
Lekkhat in iminchu chongkha inngamnajei, takkha lekkhat inchu leingamnamu.

Khawa jarra inmani inkhatli inkhat inzootmu-ah in-inthenjei. In-inthen maklai Paul in inmani diang chongkhat aleiril, “Ratha Inthiang in Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah inliingna-ah eini nipi-nipu ngaidiang ileiminril kha-eii.
Ajarchu ama'n aleiti,
Ajarchu hiwa mi ngai malung hi akamo ejei,
Halli Paul in arilnook-ah, “Hiwa jarra Pathian sanminringna hi zaatlop ngaidiang ajuotir iti nangni'n kajet eru: inmani innum inrangai sik eii!”
(Hiwa chong ngaihi ama'n aril pha, Jihudi ngai khatli khat karra in-insuolla in-inthenjei.)
Paul ama'n isaal innkhan kumni omma, amadiang kaheiwa rakip kha akeiluutjei.
Ama'n kachi khat-um kasur omleiya Pumi Jisu Christa jarra aminchu khat-um Pathian Rengram jarra arilla aleiom.
